content.pali: “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ abhāvitaṁ abahulīkataṁ dukkhādhivahaṁ hoti yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ.
content.english: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed and cultivated, brings such suffering as the mind.

content.pali: Cittaṁ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṁ abahulīkataṁ dukkhādhivahaṁ hotī”ti.
content.russian: Неразвитый и не разработанный ум принрсит боль.
content.english: An undeveloped and uncultivated mind brings suffering.

quote.pali: “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ abhāvitaṁ abahulīkataṁ dukkhādhivahaṁ hoti yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ.
quote.english: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed and cultivated, brings such suffering as the mind.

quote.pali: Cittaṁ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṁ abahulīkataṁ dukkhādhivahaṁ hotī”ti.
quote.russian: Неразвитый и не разработанный ум принрсит боль.
quote.english: An undeveloped and uncultivated mind brings suffering.

data: an1.29:1.1 “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ abhāvitaṁ abahulīkataṁ dukkhādhivahaṁ hoti yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ. “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed and cultivated, brings such suffering as the mind.dukkha -> sukha
